ancestors.content:
@catsalad @AccordionBruce To be fair, I’d be happier if there were no ruling generation, but yep, I certainly don’t want that hat.
I am a bit hopeful that Millennials/Z may actually see enough of the shit our parents did to understand the instability, lack of sustainability, and sheer incoherence of their pathway. And a bit fearful that those who come after will forget the suffering, and only remember legends of the parties.
Fortunately, I should be long dead by then, maybe fertilising a rose bed or an apple tree.

ancestors.content:
@hypostase @catsalad
I feel regret for some of my own cynicism, and lack of success at handing on a better planet to the younger gens

They seem very aware of the shit deal they’ve been handed

I guess their kids might blame them even more if things get worse as many predict

Unless we can turn things around

descendants.content:
@AccordionBruce @catsalad Unfortunately I suspect the ozone layer, and some of the early successes acted as a sort of anti-activist vaccine for corporations. They have been working to immunise themselves ever since Carter (as a Kiwi, l’ve limited, alien, insight here). Money in politics has allowed them to define the free market as a set of rules that allows them freedom, but no one else.
The other trouble is, that to reverse that takes time, and has a cost. The faster it’s done the higher the cost, it’s just a question of who pays. Probably not the people with the bunkers.
I would like to see money redefined as a mechanism for everyone to use effectively to get what they need, rather than a mechanism to keep score. The level of inequality shows it is more the latter than former, now. Part of that probably is different rules and taxes, but part of it is deeper. Different thinking.

descendants.content:
@hypostase @catsalad
Guns in the US are out of control as a result of the successes in reducing cigarette smoking

The #gun manufacturers freaked out and dug up the 2nd Amendment and National Rifle Association #NRA which had never been used that way

Ronald #Reagan, who had formally signed gun control legislation to control the #BlackPanthers, suddenly become a gun-lobby promoter, even after he got shot himself

Profits and deaths (mostly suicides) pilled up ever since
https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2017/10/2/16399418/america-mass-shooting-gun-violence-statistics-charts
